name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - A suitably qualified and experienced person shall be nominated by the Constructor as the ‘Piling Supervisor’.
Frequency - Prior to any piling works commencing.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The Designer shall be provided with the proposed concrete mix design for review, prior to any piling works commencing.
Frequency - Prior to any piling works commencing.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Spiral reinforcement shall not be lapped. Spiral reinforcement shall start and stop with 1.5 x pile cage circumference overlap and a single sided lap weld. Laps in longitudinal bars shall be made with D-clamps or similar means accepted by the Designer. Lapped joints shall achieve the full strength of the bar.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Designer inspection of reinforcement cage fabrication process for the first pile at every structure  with the Opportunity to inspect (at random for subsequent piles at the same structure)
Frequency - First pile at every structure
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The casing dimensions shall comply with the outside diameter, wall thickness and internal diameter as shown on the Drawings
Verifying Document - Mill Certs and Dimensions
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - the Constructor shall confirm that the properties of the casing are such that the bored piles are constructed to the dimensions, shape and depth.
4.07.07 - Bored Pile Construction Record Card Template
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Supply a Template for the bored pile construction record card a minimum of 3 weeks prior to the commencement of any piling works.
Verifying Document - Construction Record Card Template
Frequency - 3 weeks prior to the commencement of any piling
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Reinforcing bars and mesh shall comply with AS/NZS4671:2001.
